DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyse efficacy of teriparatide treatment in patients with new forms of inherited low-turnover osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Teriparatide Treatment in Patients With Inherited Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: inherited lowturnover osteoporosis lumbar spine or hip BMD Tscore â‰¤ 2.5 a written informed consent. age less than 18 years generally accepted contraindications for the treatment
DOC.keyword: New forms of inherited low-turnover osteoporosis
